name: portfolio
description: A cosmic-themed portfolio showcasing prismatic animations, Three.js visuals, and Tailwind styling

scripts.lint: echo 'Linting not configured. Add ESLint/Prettier for code consistency.'
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Checking peer dependencies and types...' && npm ls postcss vite-plugin-image-optimizer tailwindcss typescript tailwindcss-animate vite-plugin-webfont-dl pdfjs-dist vite-plugin-static-copy && echo 'Verifying vite-plugin-webfont-dl, pdfjs-dist, vite-plugin-static-copy...' && npm list vite-plugin-webfont-dl pdfjs-dist vite-plugin-static-copy || echo 'Dependency or type issue detected. Run `npm install vite-plugin-webfont-dl pdfjs-dist vite-plugin-static-copy`. Check proxy: `npm config get proxy` and registry: `npm config get registry`.'

// cosmic-theme: Dependencies below support the cosmic aesthetic with prismatic colors, glowing animations, and holographic effects
// animation: gsap, framer-motion, tailwindcss-animate for prismatic transitions and scroll effects
// 3d-visuals: three, cannon-es for cosmic Three.js scenes (e.g., ThreeCanvas.jsx)
// styling: tailwindcss, autoprefixer, vite-plugin-purgecss for aurora gradients and glows
// assets: vite-plugin-svgr for cosmic SVG icons, vite-plugin-env-compatible for EmailJS keys, vite-plugin-image-optimizer for cosmic images, vite-plugin-webfont-dl for cosmic typography, vite-plugin-static-copy for pdfjs-dist cmaps and fonts
